About Bobby Schade

I started with web development in early 2019, shortly after I relocated from Cleveland, Ohio to Houston, Texas. Over time, I have become increasingly excited and motivated to learn more and improve my skills. I love refactoring code and am intent on writing the best code possible.

My work can be seen above as well as on my GitHub (link in footer). I am eager to bring value to a team that is focused on producing excellent work and solving interesting, meaningful challenges.

When I'm not coding, I enjoy good music, television, and movies. I also love being active, particularly by playing tennis, basketball, golf, and ping-pong.
